parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Fillet edge for which to get a value (see Remarks )

title: IVariableFilletFeatureData2.IGetConicRhoOrRadius
description: Gets the conic rho, conic radius, or circular radius of this fillet.

parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Fillet edge for which to get a value (see Remarks )

returns: Conic rho, conic radius, or circular radius
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IVariableFilletFeatureData2::IGetFilletEdgeAtIndex
to specify PFilletItem.
The type of value returned by this method corresponds to the
IVariableFilletFeatureData2::ConicTypeForCrossSectionProfile
setting.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
